pages.speaker: Alice
lines: Hello, Tom. The Christmas party is about to start.
I'm really busy. Can you help me out?

pages.speaker: Tom
lines: Of course! What can I help you with?

pages.speaker: Alice
lines: I need to put the new decorations Roki bought in the venue. Can you find Roki and help place them in the right spots?
Also, I can't find Bob the photographer. Can you find him and ask him to go to the party venue to take photos?
One more thing, we're short on drinks at the party. Ask Samuel if he can make some more.

pages.speaker: NPC5
lines: You are finally here! It is your turn for White Elephant. Pick a gift!
